body.p:
To his excellency
B Magoffin Gov of Ky

The undersigned Petitioners state that, A Phipps at the March Term 18621 of this Court was fined $50. He is a clever man. industrious and has a family. We request the Gov. to remit the fine. especially as he is a harmless inoffensive man.

J. H. Scholl
R. Apperson Jr.
Thos. S
J. H. Boone
M Stewart
W M Combs
Jas B Hardwick
T. F.

Dear Governor I wrote the above petition, the people of Powell tell me the fine should be remitted, and, as I know Phipps to be a harmless inoffensive, hard working man ignorant of law I hope you will grant him, all the clemency you can & remit the fine
Yours Truly J M Nesbitt Comth Atto

Powell Cir Ct
$50
A. Phipps
Remission Issd May 29, 1862
